title: Creeping Up on Christmas
description: As Violet Sidhu and her friends prepare to sell hats at the Halloway Hills Middle School Christmas fair, they discover their hats have gone missing!In book two of the Halloway Hills Middle School Mysteries, after a box of crocheted hats goes missing, Violet and her friends must come up with an alternative plan to raise money at the annual Christmas fair.When Violet discovers what’s happened to her hats, thanks to the new guy at school, getting them back turns out to be harder than she thought. Will Violet get her hats back in time for the school’s Christmas fair? A short, page-turning story for ages 9-11. Includes bonus cookie recipe!* The paperback version is formatted using Century Gothic font, larger type, and more space to help ease reading challenges.
author: A.J. Kormon
